version_description:
- Minor bug fixes
- Performance improvement
- Add new Fishes

- Minor bug fixes
- Optimized the performance of the battle game
- Add Japanese and Korean to the game

- Minor bug fixes
- Optimized gameplay in Survival Mode and Squid Mode
- Performance improvement

- Added Portuguese and Indonesian languages to the game

- Added 5 Advanced Fishes and 1 Special Fish

- Optimized the standby and battle animations of fish

- Added subscription product【Deep sea SVIP】

-The [version update] button is added to the avatar in the upper right corner, and the selectable national flag is enriched
